Why Support LLOOOOMM?

‚è∞ Why Now?

We're at a critical moment in educational history. AI is transforming everything, but most educational technology is still stuck in the past. LLOOOOMM represents a once-in-a-generation opportunity to get ahead of the curve, to build learning systems that prepare humans for an AI-collaborative future rather than trying to catch up later.

Don would much rather be programming than fundraising. Your support lets him focus on what he does best - building the impossible and making it real.
